name: Bullet Hellth
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for the Game Makers Tool Kit Game Jam in July of 2017!

We were all tasked with creating a game where the mechanics were dual purposed.  In this game, not only does shooting have a chance to kill the bad guys, but it also replenishes your health!  Pretty cool, right?  Watch out though, as you have a limited supply of ammunition.  If you fire willy-nilly, then you will run out of ammo and be unable to defend or heal yourself.
